    Executes a simulated sell operation, adding shares to the market and crediting the buyer's capital.

    simulateBuy(ActionEvent) - Method in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Simulates the purchase of shares based on the current price and input amount.
    simulatedShares - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Tracks the number of shares currently "owned" in the simulation.
    SimulatedTradePanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    A Swing-based UI panel that allows users to simulate buying and selling stocks in a visual trading environment.
    SimulatedTradePanel(StockMarket) - Constructor for class SimulatedTradePanel
    Initializes the trading panel and constructs the UI.
    SimulatedTradeWindow - Class in Unnamed Package
    SimulatedTradeWindow is a standalone window that embeds a SimulatedTradePanel inside a custom undecorated CustomWindowPanel.
    SimulatedTradeWindow(StockMarket) - Constructor for class SimulatedTradeWindow
    Constructs and displays a new simulated trading window.
    simulateSell(ActionEvent) - Method in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Simulates the sale of shares at the current price.

    This class helps you retrieve values from the given input.

    Skeleton - package Skeleton
     
    speak - Variable in class Buyer
    If true, the buyer will print its trading activity to the console for logging/debugging.
    StartNetWorth - Variable in class Buyer

    Stock - Class in Unnamed Package

    stockMarket - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Reference to the stock market from which current prices will be retrieved during buy/sell simulations.
    StockMarket - Class in Unnamed Package
    The StockMarket class is the core simulation engine for the stock trading environment.
    StockMarket(SimulationInput) - Constructor for class StockMarket
    Constructs a basic StockMarket instance with a reference to simulation input.
    StockMarket(SimulationInput, int, double, int, int) - Constructor for class StockMarket
    Constructs a fully initialized StockMarket simulation with a tracked stock, buyer registry, news system, and major event scheduler.
    StockObserver - Interface in Unnamed Package
    The StockObserver interface should be implemented by any class that wants to be notified when the stock price is updated.
    Stocks - Variable in class StockMarket
    List of observers (MarketObserver implementations) that react to market updates.
    stop - Variable in class Buyer
    Flag used to indicate that the buyer should stop its thread execution.
    Stop() - Method in class Buyer
    Signals the buyer thread to stop gracefully.
    stopRefreshing() - Method in class BuyerStatsPanel
    Stops the periodic refresh of buyer statistics.

    Submits end-of-simulation metrics to the Statistics singleton.
    submitStatistics() - Method in class Robot
